column1: The following issues were raised by parties who dealt with the devaluation of Â½ share of Karthelis alias
(a)  Issue number 2 was raised on behalf of the substituted plaintiff.
(b) Issues 4 to 17 were raised on behalf of the 1st, 2nd and 18th defendant.

(d) Issues 34 and 35 were raised on behalf of the 3rd and 4th defendants.
